body: Todas as personagens femininas que esse artista desenha encaixam perfeitamente nos meus gostos. E isso infelizmente significa que sou lolicon, perdão a todos que acreditaram em mim
I like this a lot. True romance and love is fully dedication to the point of obsession forever.
Yes Please Procure Ownership Of My Life My Goddess I Will Worship Your Body Faithfuly All Hail The Loli Goddessess
Still, this Artist and their obsession with "owning" others and their characters with the <™> "creepy smile" always sent shiver down to my tip. Ugh.
Seem like this Artist is reusing his model to its limit. "I've wasted time trying to perfect this model so i'm gonna use this model till its not so perfect anymore".
